CustomField.description:
Salesforce.com Change Request: NICC-012689
The current "Quantity" field in the Softrax Asset table pulls from "units" field in Softrax. The actual Quantity is, for the most part, the product of ( units * NumberOfUsers ). In some cases where the units value = the number of users value, the Quantity = Units and not the product of the two.
CustomField.label: NumberOfUsers
